        Returns:
        A list of directions indicating where the query should be propagated.

      • requestAlreadyProcessed

        protected boolean requestAlreadyProcessed(java.lang.String requestUri)
        Checks if a request with the given URI has already been processed. This method ensures that each request is processed only once.
        Parameters:
        requestUri - The URI of the request to check.
        Returns:
        true if the request has already been processed, false otherwise.

      • removeProcessedRequest

        protected void removeProcessedRequest(java.lang.String requestUri)
        Removes a processed request from the list of processed requests. This method is typically called to clean up after a request has been fully processed.
        Parameters:
        requestUri - The URI of the request to remove.

      • addToProcessedRequests

        protected void addToProcessedRequests(java.lang.String requestUri)
        Adds a request URI to the list of processed requests. This method tracks which requests have been processed and schedules a task to remove it after a timeout.
        Parameters:
        requestUri - The URI of the request to add to the list.
